structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases

law.catch_line: Signature Of Magistrate Or Clerk; Service
law.text: If the writ is issued by the court when sitting for the transaction of business, it shall be signed by the clerk, otherwise by the magistrate issuing it, and may be served in any county by any sheriff or deputy sheriff.
